modelIdentification.name: SISO-STD-001.1-2015 - Real-time Platform Reference Synthetic Environment FOM Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The RPR FOM supports interoperability for real-time, platform oriented defense simulation.
modelIdentification.description: The Synthetic Environment FOM module relates to the simulation of environmental information both under the form of (point, linear, areal) objects and processes.

reference.identification: Real-time Platform Reference Base FOM Module
Standard for Guidance, Rationale, and Interoperability Modalities for the Real-time Platform Reference Federation Object Model (RPR FOM) SISO-STD-001-2015 10 August 2015
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1-1995 September 21, 1995
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1a-1998 19 March 1998

objectClass.name: EnvironmentalEntity
objectClass.semantics: An object which has physical extent but not necessarily fixed size and shape, such as meteorological effects such as clouds or smokes.

attribute.name: OpacityCode
attribute.semantics: Specifies the density of an environmental entity

objectClass.name: EnvironmentObject
objectClass.semantics: A base class of environment point, linear, or areal object classes.

attribute.name: ObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies this EnvironmentObject instance (point, linear or areal)

attribute.name: ReferencedObjectIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the Synthetic Environment object instance to which this EnvironmentObject instance is associated

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the force that created or modified this EnvironmentObject instance

attribute.name: ObjectType
attribute.semantics: Identifies the type of this EnvironmentObject instance

objectClass.name: ArealObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that is geometrically anchored to the terrain with a set of three or more points, which comes to a closure.

attribute.name: PointsData
attribute.semantics: Specifies the physical location (a collection of points) of the object

attribute.name: PercentComplete
attribute.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

attribute.name: DamagedAppearance
attribute.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object

attribute.name: ObjectPreDistributed
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

attribute.name: Deactivated
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

attribute.name: Smoking
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

attribute.name: Flaming
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is aflame

objectClass.name: OtherArealObject
objectClass.semantics: Areal objects other than Minefield objects.

objectClass.name: LinearObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that has size and an orientation and is geometrically anchored to the terrain with one point.

objectClass.name: BreachableLinearObject
objectClass.semantics: A linear object that can be breached.

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies a breachable linear object

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies a breach linear object

attribute.name: SegmentRecords
attribute.semantics: Specifies an exhaust smoke linear object

objectClass.name: OtherLinearObject
objectClass.semantics: Linear objects other than BreachableLinear, Breach, ExhaustSmoke, or MinefieldLaneMarker objects.

objectClass.name: PointObject
objectClass.semantics: A synthetic environment object that is geometrically anchored to the terrain with a single point.

attribute.name: Location
attribute.semantics: Specifies the location of the object based on x, y and z coordinates

attribute.name: Orientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the angles of rotation around the coordinate axis between the object's attitude and the reference coordinate system axes ; these are calculated as the Tait-Bryan Euler angles, specifying the successive rotations needed to transform from the world coordinate system to the object coordinate system

attribute.name: PercentComplete
attribute.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

attribute.name: DamagedAppearance
attribute.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object instance

attribute.name: ObjectPreDistributed
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

attribute.name: Deactivated
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

attribute.name: Smoking
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

attribute.name: Flaming
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is aflame

objectClass.name: BreachablePointObject
objectClass.semantics: A point object that can be breached.

attribute.name: BreachedStatus
attribute.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the object

attribute.name: PercentOpacity
attribute.semantics: Specifies the opacity of the smoke

attribute.name: CylinderSize
attribute.semantics: Specifies the radius of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

attribute.name: CylinderHeight
attribute.semantics: Specifies the height of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

attribute.name: NumberOfBursts
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of bursts in the instance of tactical smoke

attribute.name: ChemicalContent
attribute.semantics: Specifies the chemical content of the smoke

objectClass.name: CraterObject
objectClass.semantics: A pit, depression, or cavity formed in the surface of the earth by an explosion. The depression's shape can range from saucer to conical, depending largely of the depth of burst.

attribute.name: CraterSize
attribute.semantics: Specifies the diameter of the crater, where the center of the crater is at the point object location

objectClass.name: OtherPointObject
objectClass.semantics: Point objects other than Breachable, Burst, Crater, RibbonBridge, or Structure objects.

attribute.name: NumberOfSegments
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of segments composing the ribbon bridge

objectClass.name: StructureObject
objectClass.semantics: A building structure, building rubble, stationary bridge, AVLB object.

objectClass.name: EnvironmentProcess
objectClass.semantics: An object class used to communicate information about environmental processes and effects.

attribute.name: ProcessIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies which process issued the environmental process update

attribute.name: Type
attribute.semantics: Identifies the environmental process type

attribute.name: ModelType
attribute.semantics: Identifies the model used for generating this environmental process update ; defined in 1278.1a as being exercise specific

attribute.name: EnvironmentProcessActive
attribute.semantics: Specifies the status of the environmental process (active or inactive)

attribute.name: SequenceNumber
attribute.semantics: Optional, used to support update sequencing ; if not used, set to EP_NO_SEQUENCE ; when used, set to zero for each exercise and incremented by one for each update sent

attribute.name: EnvironmentRecData
attribute.semantics: Specifies environment records

objectClass.name: GriddedData
objectClass.semantics: An object class used to depict global, spatially varying environmental effects.

attribute.name: GridIdentifier
attribute.semantics: Identifies the environmental simulation application

attribute.name: CoordinateSystem
attribute.semantics: Specifies the coordinate system used to locate the data grid

attribute.name: NumberOfGridAxes
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of grid axes used to define the data grid (e.g. three grid axes for an x, y, z coordinate system)

attribute.name: ConstantGrid
attribute.semantics: Specifies whether the grid axes remain constant for the life of the data grid

attribute.name: EnvironmentType
attribute.semantics: Identifies the type of environmental entity being described

attribute.name: Orientation
attribute.semantics: Specifies the orientation of the data grid, with Euler angles

attribute.name: SampleTime
attribute.semantics: Specifies the valid time of the environmental data sample

attribute.name: TotalValues
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of data values that make up this grid

attribute.name: VectorDimension
attribute.semantics: Specifies the number of data values at each grid point ; VectorDimension shall be one for scalar data, and shall be greater than one when multiple enumerated environmental data values are sent for each grid point (e.g. u, v, w wind components have VectorDimension = 3)

attribute.name: GridAxisInfo
attribute.semantics: Specifies information on grid axes

attribute.name: GridDataInfo
attribute.semantics: Specifies information on grid data representations

interactionClass.name: EnvironmentObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: A base interaction for modifying instances of point, linear and areal environment object classes.

parameter.name: ObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies this EnvironmentObject instance (point, linear or areal)

parameter.name: ReferencedObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the Synthetic Environment object instance to which this EnvironmentObject instance is associated

parameter.name: ForceIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the force that created or modified this EnvironmentObject instance

parameter.name: ObjectType
parameter.semantics: Identifies the type of this EnvironmentObject instance

parameter.name: RequestingIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the simulation application sending the EnvironmentObjectTransaction interaction

parameter.name: ReceivingIdentifier
parameter.semantics: Identifies the simulation application receiving the EnvironmentObjectTransaction interaction

interactionClass.name: ArealObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the ArealObject class.

parameter.name: PointsData
parameter.semantics: Specifies the physical location (a collection of points) that defines the object

parameter.name: PercentComplete
parameter.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

parameter.name: DamagedAppearance
parameter.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object

parameter.name: ObjectPreDistributed
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

parameter.name: Deactivated
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

parameter.name: Smoking
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

parameter.name: Flaming
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is flaming

interactionClass.name: OtherArealObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherArealObject class.

interactionClass.name: LinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the LinearObject class.

interactionClass.name: BreachableLinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachableLinearObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies a breachable linear object

interactionClass.name: BreachObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies a breach linear object

interactionClass.name: ExhaustSmokeObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the ExhaustSmokeObject class.

parameter.name: SegmentRecords
parameter.semantics: Specifies an exhaust smoke linear object

interactionClass.name: OtherLinearObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherLinearObject class.

interactionClass.name: PointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction for modifying instances of the PointObject class.

parameter.name: Location
parameter.semantics: Specifies the location of the object based on x, y and z coordinates

parameter.name: Orientation
parameter.semantics: Specifies the angles of rotation around the coordinate axis between the object's attitude and the reference coordinate system axes ; these are calculated as the Tait-Bryan Euler angles, specifying the successive rotations needed to transform from the world coordinate system to the object coordinate system

parameter.name: PercentComplete
parameter.semantics: Specifies the percent completion of the object

parameter.name: DamagedAppearance
parameter.semantics: Specifies the damaged appearance of the object

parameter.name: ObjectPreDistributed
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object was created before the start of the exercise

parameter.name: Deactivated
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object has been deactivated (it has ceased to exist in the synthetic environment)

parameter.name: Smoking
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is smoking (creating a smoke plume)

parameter.name: Flaming
parameter.semantics: Specifies whether or not the object is flaming

interactionClass.name: BreachablePointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BreachablePointObject class.

parameter.name: BreachedStatus
parameter.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the object

interactionClass.name: BurstPointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the BurstPointObject class.

parameter.name: PercentOpacity
parameter.semantics: Specifies the opacity of the smoke

parameter.name: CylinderSize
parameter.semantics: Specifies the radius of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

parameter.name: CylinderHeight
parameter.semantics: Specifies the height of the cylinder approximating an individual smoke burst ; for multiple bursts, the center bottom of each cylinder is calculated based on the model used to represent the multiple bursts

parameter.name: NumberOfBursts
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of bursts in the instance of tactical smoke

parameter.name: ChemicalContent
parameter.semantics: Specifies the chemical content of the smoke

interactionClass.name: CraterObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the CraterObject class.

parameter.name: CraterSize
parameter.semantics: Specifies the diameter of the crater, where the center of the crater is at the point object location

interactionClass.name: OtherPointObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the OtherPointObject class.

interactionClass.name: RibbonBridgeObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the RibbonBridgeObject class.

parameter.name: NumberOfSegments
parameter.semantics: Specifies the number of segments composing the ribbon bridge

interactionClass.name: StructureObjectTransaction
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent to an environment manager to request the creation, modification, or deletion of instances of the StructureObject class.

arrayData.name: BreachableSegmentStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies a breachable linear object (a collection of segments)

arrayData.name: BreachedStatusArray8
arrayData.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance for each individual segment portion of length = BreachLength

arrayData.name: BreachStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies a breach linear object (a collection of segments)

arrayData.name: EnvironmentRecStructArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies environment records as a collection of geometry and state records

arrayData.name: ExhaustSmokeStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies an exhaust smoke linear object (a collection of smoke segments)

arrayData.name: GridAxisStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies detailed information for a collection of grid axes

arrayData.name: GridDataStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Specifies detailed information for a collection of grid data representations

fixedRecordData.name: BreachableSegmentStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying the characteristics of a breachable linear object segment

field.name: SegmentParameters
field.semantics: Specifies the breachable linear object segment characteristics

field.name: BreachLength
field.semantics: Specifies the breachable linear object segment as 8 portions of length = BreachLength

field.name: BreachedState
field.semantics: Specifies the breached appearance of the breachable linear object segment

field.name: SegmentBreached
field.semantics: Specifies whether the segment portion beginning at the segment origin + (i*BreachLength) and extending BreachLength meters is breached or not

fixedRecordData.name: BreachStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying the characteristics of a breach linear object segment

field.name: SegmentParameters
field.semantics: Specifies the breach linear object segment characteristics

fixedRecordData.name: DimensionRateStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying length X, Y, Z rates

fixedRecordData.name: EnvironmentObjectTypeStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying the domain, the kind and the specific identification of the environment object

field.name: Domain
field.semantics: Specifies the domain in which the object exists

field.name: Category
field.semantics: Specifies the main category that describes the object

field.name: Subcategory
field.semantics: Specifies a particular subcategory to which an object belongs based on the Category field

fixedRecordData.name: EnvironmentRecStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying an environment (geometry or state) record

field.name: Index
field.semantics: Identifies the sequentially numbered record index

field.name: DataVariant
field.semantics: Specifies geometry and state record alternatives

fixedRecordData.name: EnvironmentTypeStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying the kind of environment, the domain and any extra information necessary for describing the environmental entity

field.name: Domain
field.semantics: Specifies a single primary domain in which the environmental condition exists

field.name: Class
field.semantics: Identifies the type of environmental entity

field.name: Category
field.semantics: Specifies the main category that describes the environmental entity

field.name: Subcategory
field.semantics: Specifies a particular subcategory to which an environmental entity belongs based on the Category field

field.name: Specific
field.semantics: Identifies specific information about an environmental entity based on the Subcategory field

field.name: Extra
field.semantics: Specifies extra information required to describe a particular environmental entity

fixedRecordData.name: ExhaustSmokeStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying the characteristics of a linear object smoke segment

field.name: SegmentParameters
field.semantics: Specifies the linear object smoke segment characteristics

field.name: PercentOpacity
field.semantics: Specifies the opacity of the linear object smoke segment

field.name: Attached
field.semantics: Specifies whether the linear object smoke segment is attached to the vehicle

field.name: ChemicalContent
field.semantics: Specifies the chemical content of the linear object smoke segment

fixedRecordData.name: GaussPlumeGeomRecStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying Gaussian Plume geometry record

fixedRecordData.name: GaussPuffGeomRecStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying Gaussian Puff geometry record

fixedRecordData.name: GridAxisStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying grid Xi axis data

field.name: InitialValue
field.semantics: Specifies the coordinate of the origin (or initial value) for the Xi axis

field.name: FinalValue
field.semantics: Specifies the coordinate of the endpoint (or final value) for the Xi axis

field.name: TotalNumberOfPoints
field.semantics: Specifies the total number of grid points along the Xi domain axis

field.name: InterleafFactor
field.semantics: Specifies the integer valued interleaf factor along a domain (grid) Xi axis ; a value of one shall indicate no sub-sampling (interleaving), while integer values greater than one shall indicate the sampling frequency along an axis

field.name: NumberOfPoints
field.semantics: Specifies the number of grid locations along the Xi axis

field.name: InitialIndex
field.semantics: Specifies the index of the initial grid point along the Xi domain axis

field.name: PaddingTo32
field.semantics: Brings the record length to a 32-bit boundary

field.name: Scale
field.semantics: Specifies the constant scale factor used to scale the environmental state variable data values

field.name: Offset
field.semantics: Specifies the constant offset used to scale the environmental state variable data values

field.name: NumberOfValues-A-Values
field.semantics: Specifies the number of environmental state variable data values

field.name: PaddingTo32
field.semantics: Brings the record length to a 32-bit boundary

field.name: NumberOfValues-A-Values
field.semantics: Specifies the number of environmental state variable data values

fixedRecordData.name: IrregularGridAxisStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying irregular (variable spacing) axis data

field.name: CoordinateScale
field.semantics: Specifies the value that linearly scales the coordinates of the grid locations for the Xi axis

field.name: CoordinateOffset
field.semantics: Specifies the constant offset value that shall be applied to the grid locations for the Xi axis

field.name: NumberOfGridLocations-A-GridLocations
field.semantics: Specifies the coordinate values for the Ni grid locations along the irregular (variable spacing) Xi axis

field.name: PaddingTo64
field.semantics: Brings the record length to a 64-bit boundary

fixedRecordData.name: RectVol1GeomRecStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying Rectangular Volume 1 geometry record

fixedRecordData.name: RectVol2GeomRecStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying Rectangular Volume 2 geometry record

fixedRecordData.name: Sphere1GeomRecStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying Bounding Sphere & Sphere 1 geometry record

fixedRecordData.name: RectVol3GeomRecStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Record specifying Rectangular Volume 3 geometry record

variantRecordData.name: EnvironmentRecVariantStruct

alternative.name: BoundingSphereGeometryData
alternative.semantics: Specifies Bounding Sphere geometry record alternative

alternative.name: RectVol1GeometryData
alternative.semantics: Specifies Rectangular Volume 1 geometry record alternative

alternative.name: RectVol2GeometryData
alternative.semantics: Specifies Rectangular Volume 2 geometry record alternative

alternative.name: GaussPlumeGeometryData
alternative.semantics: Specifies Gaussian Plume geometry record alternative

alternative.name: GaussPuffGeometryData
alternative.semantics: Specifies Gaussian Puff geometry record alternative

alternative.name: RectVol3GeometryData
alternative.semantics: Specifies Rectangular Volume 3 geometry record alternative

variantRecordData.semantics: Record specifying either a geometry or a state record

variantRecordData.name: GridAxisTypeVariantStruct

alternative.name: IrregularGridAxis
alternative.semantics: Specifies irregular (variable spacing) axis data alternative

variantRecordData.semantics: Record specifying either regular (fixed spacing) or irregular (variable spacing) axis data

variantRecordData.name: GridDataRepresentationVariantStruct
variantRecordData.semantics: Record specifying either type 0 or type 1 or type 2 data representation

note.label: RPRnoteSE6
note.semantics: The structure of this datatype follows that defined in SISO-REF-010 (section 12.3.5.1)

note.label: RPRnoteSE7
note.semantics: There is no data associated with the uniform geometry complex datatype ; however, to correctly align fields within the EnvironmentRecStruct complex datatype all environmental record datatypes (including this datatype) must have a size which is a multiple of 64 bits ; hence 64 bits of padding are included in this record

note.label: RPRnoteSE8
note.semantics: Damaged appearance for environment objects has values 0: no damage, 1: damaged and 2: destroyed, with respect to the DIS standard as defined in SISO-REF-010 (section 12.1.2.1) ; this has to be taken into account when setting up a DIS-HLA gateway (SDEM mapping and filtering)

note.label: RPRnoteSE9
note.semantics: Breached appearance for point objects and areal objects has values 0: no breaching, 1: breached and 2: cleared, with respect to the DIS standard as defined in SISO-REF-010 (section 12.1.2.2.2 & 12.1.2.4.1) ; this has to be taken into account when setting up a DIS-HLA gateway (SDEM mapping and filtering)

note.label: RPRnoteSE10
note.semantics: Breached appearance for linear object segments has values 0: portion is not breached, 1: portion breached, with respect to the DIS standard as defined in SISO-REF-010 (section 12.1.2.3.1) ; this has to be taken into account when setting up a DIS-HLA gateway (SDEM mapping and filtering)

note.label: RPRnoteSE11
note.semantics: All padding fields shall be set to the value 0
